postScript:
:Print 'date is &AE_Date, physical date is &Phy_date'
:print 'time is &time'
:print 'job is &me and parent is &parent'
!
:set &act = activate_uc_object(JB_activated,,,,,PASS_VALUES)
:print 'return code of activate is &act'
preScript:
:Put_att host='SVA_DEMO'
!
:set &AE_Date = sys_date("MM/DD/YYYY")
:set &Phy_date = sys_date_physical("MM/DD/YYYY")
:set &time = sys_time()
:set &me = sys_act_me_name()
:set &parent = sys_act_parent_name()
!

!:set &date = sys_date('MM/DD/YYYY')
!:print 'date is &date'
!:if &date <> '01/15/2025'
!:  print 'exit job w/o execution'
!:  stop nomsg,01
!:endif

processingCommand.script:
mkdir /tmp/GitHub/

cd /tmp

ls -al

pwd

whoami

echo date is ${currentDateYY}
